title: Red Raven Comics
additional-notes: A note in the 1969 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the August 1940 issue, and was filed in 1968.
This was the only issue of this comics title. Human Torch Comics took over the issue numbering later in 1940.
